think that it's a genuine option that our customers often start with I'll sit

there are absolutely customers that have applications where the answer is to actually just retain that and keep it

is a really good idea the problem is nobody goes back to the revisit thing so
they make the decision upfront right now that says I'm going to leave that where it is and then we throw the challenge of saying well that's a good decision for
now but you need to take advantage of the innovation that might be taking place on the AWS platform and come back

the first answer that you will get people will say no I don't want to move that application is too important it's

with the 95 percent so I think the revisit is the important part you can then come back after the after the the
